p: Data from all children enrolled during the entire 7 years of IRIS were evaluated. Patients who received more than 1 NA inhibitor treatment or other antivirals were excluded. Children were stratified into age groups according to presumed immunity development [ 6, 7]: ≤6 months, 6 months−1 year, 1−3 years, 3−5 years, 5−10 years, and 10−13 years.
